sentences.en: But I did not need to go to Switzerland to learn that.
sentences.cn: 到瑞士要是就为了知道这些就大可不必去了。

sentences.en: From 1879 to 1888 he wandered about Germany, Switzerland, and Italy.
sentences.cn: 从1879到1888年，他游历于德国、瑞士和意大利等地。

sentences.en: Gessler ruled over Switzerland. The Swiss people hated him.
sentences.cn: 盖斯勒统治着瑞士, 瑞士人都痛恨他.

sentences.en: I'm on my way to Switzerland, but I've lost my card. I'vegot to get a duplicate.
sentences.cn: 我正在去瑞士的路上,可是我把卡弄丢了,得去补办一张.

sentences.en: Ms Highsmith has made Switzerland her home.
sentences.cn: 海史密斯女士已经在瑞士安了家。

sentences.en: Scientists in Switzerland realised that most other researchers had been barking up the wrong tree.
sentences.cn: 瑞士科学家意识到其他研究者大多研究方向不对头。

sentences.en: Switzerland is a big exporter of watches.
Switzerland isn't all cow bells and yodelling, you know.
sentences.cn: 你知道，瑞士不仅仅只有牛铃声和约德尔调歌声。

sentences.en: Switzerland's national carrier, Swissair, has been having a hard time recently.
sentences.cn: 瑞士的国有航空公司——瑞士航空公司，最近日子很不好过。

sentences.en: The banks needed to do something, so they turned themselves into the Switzerland of the Gulf.
sentences.cn: 银行必须做点什么，于是它们把迪拜变成了波斯湾地区的瑞士。

sentences.en: The other day we had some visitors from Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 前几天我们接待了几位来自瑞士的参观者。

sentences.en: The problem is Switzerland is a smaller country and you can not compare it with other leagues like Germany, French or Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 问题在于瑞士是一个较小的国家，你不能把它与像德国、法国或英国这样的大国的国家队相比。

sentences.en: The River Rhine rises in Switzerland.
The scenery in Switzerland is exceedingly attractive to the tourists from the whole world.
sentences.cn: 瑞士的风景对来自全世界的游客都很有吸引力.

sentences.en: The story of the bravery of William Tell and his son quickly got round, throughout Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 威廉·泰尔和他儿子的勇敢的故事很快就传遍了全瑞士.

sentences.en: Two men answer-ing the description of the suspects tried to enter Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 与描述的疑犯样子相符的两名男子试图进入瑞士。
